messages.author: akalin
messages.text: i think you can just inline this into HandleUnrecoverableErrorReporting, removing the need for this extra function

messages.author: lipalani1
messages.text:
FWIW I wanted to name the new function RecordUnrecoverableError and get rid of this function. But I remember hearing some mention about making this function report 'more' to UMA statistics like the type of failure etc(by hard coding the strings). Thats why did not touch this. But looking at the code there is no todos in place and I personally think breakpad would be of more use. So implemented your suggestion and got rid of the method.
On 2012/03/03 01:37:36, akalin wrote:
> i think you can just inline this into HandleUnrecoverableErrorReporting,
> removing the need for this extra function

messages.author: akalin
messages.text: why don't we call RecordUnrecoverableError here?  We do so for the non-frontend DTC.  If there's a reason, please add a comment.
